downloadTitle: Disk Space Monitoring add-in for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Get a graphical view of the free space available in the servers on your network with this Visio 2010 add-in.

downloadFile.name: User Guide for Visio Add-In for Disk Space Monitoring.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/b/1/8b1cd07a-b098-4eb6-b3ce-c6c7fa8503b4/User Guide for Visio Add-In for Disk Space Monitoring.docx

downloadFile.name: Visio Services Data Provider for Disk Space Monitoring add-in user guide.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/b/1/8b1cd07a-b098-4eb6-b3ce-c6c7fa8503b4/Visio Services Data Provider for Disk Space Monitoring add-in user guide.docx

detailsSection: Use this add-in to get a graphical view of the free space available in the servers on your network. The Microsoft Visio 2010 Add-in for Disk Space Monitoring has two components: client component and server component. The client component uses the new data graphics feature of Visio 2010 to display the results of server monitoring. It integrates with Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2007 to get the disk free space details. And the server component makes it possible to publish the data-linked diagram to Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 and refresh it in real time, making the information broadly available through a browser.
detailsSection_file_name: User Guide for Visio Add-In for Disk Space Monitoring.docx
Visio Services Data Provider for Disk Space Monitoring add-in user guide.docx
systemRequirementsSection:
• Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5
• SharePoint Server 2010
• Visio Professional 2010 or Visio Premium 2010
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download the installation files and user guide. Follow the instructions in the Visio 2010 Add-in for Disk Space Monitoring user guide to install the Visio 2010 Add-in for Disk Space Monitoring. Follow the instructions in the Visio Services Data Provider for Disk Space Monitoring user guide to install the Visio Services Data Provider for Disk Space Monitoring add-in.
